scripts.postinstall: echo 'Dependencies installed. Run npm run setup to start the voting system.'
scripts.deploy:hardhat-node: npm run is-hardhat-node-running && npx -w ./packages/fhevm-hardhat-template hardhat deploy --network localhost
scripts.setup: echo 'Starting Private Voting System...' && echo '1. Run: npm run hardhat-node (in Terminal 1)' && echo '2. Run: npm run deploy:private-voting (in Terminal 2)' && echo '3. Run: npm run dev (in Terminal 3)' && echo '4. Update contract address in PrivateVotingDemo.tsx'
scripts.deploy:private-voting: cd packages/fhevm-hardhat-template && npx hardhat run tasks/PrivateVoting.ts --network localhost
